full_summary:
### Invitation to Submit an Expression of Interest (EOI) for Leasing Office Space
**File Number:** 81002163
**Publication Date:** September 8, 2022
**Tender Closing Date:** September 22, 2022, 5:00 PM (Eastern Time)

**Notice Type:**
A request for proposal (RFP) has been issued by Public Works and Government Services Canada for the leasing of office space in Brampton, Ontario. The purpose of this RFP is to identify potential lease options to accommodate the needs of Public Works and Government Services Canada.

**Eligibility:**
Only bidders who are registered with the Supplier Registry are eligible to participate in this RFP.

**Important Documents:**
Please refer to the attached documents for the complete RFP and all relevant information.

*   **English RFP**: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/08/10054e29dbc10f1b7e240a33aea3c97f/81002163_eoi_bs_en_-_brampton_west.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/08/10054e29dbc10f1b7e240a33aea3c97f/81002163_eoi_bs_en_-_brampton_west.pdf)
*   **French RFP**: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/08/1efb5141a00f7960647978057e920493/81002163_eoi_bs_fr_-_brampton_west.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/08/1efb5141a00f7960647978057e920493/81002163_eoi_bs_fr_-_brampton_west.pdf)

**Contact Information:**

Abby Ogunleye
Public Works and Government Services Canada
10th Floor – 4900 Yonge Street
Toronto, Ontario M2N 6A6
Phone: 647-825-5652
Email: Abby.Ogunleye@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### HOW TO PARTICIPATE
To participate in this RFP, you must submit your expression of interest (EOI) by no later than September 22, 2022, 5:00 PM (
